name: Werewolf Village Attack
description:
Description

Your village is being attacked by werewolves!
You, and your trusty crossbow, are your fellow villagers only hope.

Escort them from their houses to the cathedral, the only safe place in the village.
But be careful how many you escort at once, you may be able to rescue more people by fleeing in a bigger group but the werewolves will also detect you more easily and attack in bigger numbers.

Once you brought them to the cathedral just ring the bell and extraction will come soon.

Controls KeyActionWASDMove
HOLD RReloadSHIFT SprintCTRL  CrouchLMB   ShootRMB   AimEInteract
